title: New iPhones, iPad Mini, and all the other Apple things!
description:
This week Marques and Andrew go over everything from the new Apple Event. They start off with some related Apple news first, and then dig right into all of the new gadgets including the watch, the new iPad and iPad Mini, and all of the new iPhone 13 models. Techtember is here!
